title: Murderous Cut
content:
d4 +1 Piercing+1d4 Piercing

Prey Upon the Weak: This weapon deals an additional 1~4 Piercing damage against targets with 50% of their hit points or fewer.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Odd to think that dark gods like Bhaal were once mortal. One wonders if they ever thumbed a wagon ride, thought about the weather, or ate flavoured yoghurt.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown
